key.name: context-menu-icons
key.description: If enabled, icons can be displayed in context menu. If disabled, context menu will not have any icons.

key.name: property-dlg-hidefile-checkbox
key.summary: Display a checkbox to hide or unhide a file in property dialog
key.description: If enabled, there will be a checkbox to toggle hide state of a file in property dialog. There will be a '.hidden' file generated in the folder which contains the file, which recorded all the file names that should hide from the file view.

key.name: protect-non-media-mounts
key.summary: Do not allowed eject or unmount if mount point is not under /media
key.description: If enabled, mounts which not mounted under /media will not allowed to eject or unmount.

key.name: protect-root-device-mounts
key.summary: Do not allowed eject or unmount if the mount device provided root (/) mount point
key.description: If enabled, mounts which on the same device as root (/) mount will not allowed to eject or unmount.

key.name: auto-merge
key.summary: Wether use auto merge on the desktop
key.description: If enabled, auto merge menu will display on the desktop. If disabled, auto merge menu will not display on the desktop.

key.name: water-mask
key.summary: Wether use watermask on the desktop
key.description: If enabled, watermask will display on the desktop. If disabled, watermask will not display on the desktop.

key.name: show-screen-saver
key.summary: Wether use screen saver on the desktop
key.description: If enabled, screen saver will display on the desktop. If disabled, screen saver will not display on the desktop.

key.name: context-menu
key.summary: Wether use context menu on the desktop
key.description: If enabled, context menu will display on the desktop. If disabled, context menu will not display on the desktop.

key.name: desktop-computer
key.summary: Wether use desktop computer on the desktop
key.description: If enabled, desktop computer will display on the desktop. If disabled, desktop computer will not display on the desktop.

key.name: desktop-trash
key.summary: Wether use desktop trash on the desktop
key.description: If enabled, desktop trash will display on the desktop. If disabled, desktop trash will not display on the desktop.

key.name: desktop-home-directory
key.summary: Wether use desktop home directory on the desktop
key.description: If enabled, desktop home directory will display on the desktop. If disabled, desktop home directory will not display on the desktop.

key.name: refresh
key.summary: Wether use 'Refresh' action on context menu
key.description: If enabled, 'Refresh' will display on the context menu. If disabled, 'Refresh' will not display on the context menu.
